mapper.select: select a.* ,t1.dict_label as ProjectTypeLinkText from PER_IndicatorProject a left join (select * from sys_dict_data where dict_type='项目类型') t1 on a.ProjectType = t1.dict_value where a.IfDeleted = 0 and a.IndicatorProjectID = #{indicatorprojectid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.update: update PER_IndicatorProject set IfDeleted = 1 where IndicatorProjectID = #{indicatorprojectid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select IndicatorProjectID, ProjectType, JoinType, Points, IfDeleted from PER_IndicatorProject
